content:
XmlQueryRuntime Class

In this Article

Provides methods and properties to support the XSLT processor.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)]
public sealed class XmlQueryRuntime

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • XmlQueryRuntime

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Properties summary

ExternalContext

Returns the object that manages external user context information, such as data sources, parameters, extension objects, and so on.
NameTable

Returns the name table used to atomize all names used by the query.
Output

Gets the output writer object.
XsltFunctions

Returns the object that manages the state. The state object is required to implement various XSLT functions.

Methods summary

AddNewIndex(XPathNavigator,Int32,XmlILIndex)

Adds a newly built index over the specified context document to the existing collection of indexes.
ChangeTypeXsltArgument(Int32,Object,Type)

Converts a value from the CLR type of the value parameter to CLR destinationType by using V1 XSLT rules. Converts any result tree fragment values to nodes.
ChangeTypeXsltResult(Int32,Object)

Converts from the CLR type of the value parameter to the default CLR type by which intermediate language generation represents the XML type, based on the conversion rules of the XML type.
ComparePosition(XPathNavigator,XPathNavigator)

Compares the relative positions of two navigators.
CreateCollation(String)

Creates a collation from a string.
DebugGetGlobalNames()

Returns an array containing the names of all the global variables and parameters used in this query.
DebugGetGlobalValue(String)

Gets the value of a global value that has the specified name.
DebugGetXsltValue(IList)

Converts a sequence to its appropriate XSLT type.
DebugSetGlobalValue(String,Object)

Sets the value of a global value that has the specified name.
DocOrderDistinct(IList<XPathNavigator>)

Gets distinct sorted nodes from the specified sequence.
EarlyBoundFunctionExists(String,String)

Determines whether the specified early-bound object contains a method with the specified name.
EndRtfConstruction(XmlQueryOutput)

Finishes constructing an RTF.
EndSequenceConstruction(XmlQueryOutput)

Finishes constructing a nested sequence of items.
FindIndex(XPathNavigator,Int32,XmlILIndex)

Returns the index with the specified ID if it has already been created over the specified document, and returns true. Otherwise, creates a new, empty index and returns false.
GenerateId(XPathNavigator)

Generate a unique string identifier for the specified node.
GetAtomizedName(Int32)

Gets the atomized name at the specified index in the array of names.
GetCollation(Int32)

Gets a collation that was statically created.
GetEarlyBoundObject(Int32)

Gets the specifiied early-bound extension object. If this object does not yet exist, creates an instance using the corresponding ConstructorInfo.
GetGlobalValue(Int32)

Returns the value that is bound to the specified global variable. If the value has not yet been computed, computes it and stores it in the global variable.
GetNameFilter(Int32)

Gets the name filter at the specified index in the array of filters.
GetTypeFilter(XPathNodeType)

Gets a filter that filters nodes of the specified type.
IsGlobalComputed(Int32)

Returns true if the specified global value has already been computed.
IsQNameEqual(XPathNavigator,XPathNavigator)

Compares the stem.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName* and stem.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI* properties of two XPathNavigator instances to check if they are equal.
IsQNameEqual(XPathNavigator,Int32,Int32)

Determines whether the stem.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName* and stem.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI* properties of the specified XPathNavigator are equal to the names specified in the parameters.
MatchesXmlType(IList<XPathItem>,Int32)

Returns true if the type of every item in the specified sequence matches the XML type that the specified index identifies.
MatchesXmlType(IList<XPathItem>,XmlTypeCode)

Determines whether the type of the specified sequence is a subtype of the specified singleton type.
MatchesXmlType(XPathItem,Int32)

Returns true if the type of the specified XPathItem object matches the specified XML type.
MatchesXmlType(XPathItem,XmlTypeCode)

Returns true if the type of the XPathItem object is a subtype of a type identified by the specified XmlTypeCode.
OnCurrentNodeChanged(XPathNavigator)

Used for debugging in Visual Studio. Called after the current node has changed.
ParseTagName(String,Int32)

Parses the specified tag name and resolves the resulting prefix. If the prefix cannot be resolved, an error is thrown.
ParseTagName(String,String)

Parses the specified tag name. Returns an XmlQualifiedName that consists of the parsed local name and the specified namespace.
SendMessage(String)

Reports query execution information to the event handler.
SetGlobalValue(Int32,Object)

Returns the value that is bound to the specified global variable or parameter.
StartRtfConstruction(String,XmlQueryOutput)

Starts constructing an RTF and returns a new XmlQueryOutput object that will be used to construct this RTF.
StartSequenceConstruction(XmlQueryOutput)

Starts constructing a nested sequence of items. Returns a new XmlQueryOutput that will be used to construct this new sequence.
TextRtfConstruction(String,String)

Constructs a new XPathNavigator from the specified text.
ThrowException(String)

Throws an XML exception that has the specified message text.

Properties

  • ExternalContext

    Returns the object that manages external user context information, such as data sources, parameters, extension objects, and so on.

    public System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryContext ExternalContext { get; }

    Property Value

    • XmlQueryContext

      An instance of the XmlQueryContext class.

  • NameTable

    Returns the name table used to atomize all names used by the query.

    public System.Xml.XmlNameTable NameTable { get; }

    Property Value

    • XmlNameTable

      An instance of the XmlNameTable class.

  • Output

    Gets the output writer object.

    public System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput Output { get; }

    Property Value

    • XmlQueryOutput

      An instance of the XmlQueryOutput class.

  • XsltFunctions

    Returns the object that manages the state. The state object is required to implement various XSLT functions.

    public System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XsltLibrary XsltFunctions { get; }

    Property Value

    • XsltLibrary

      An instance of the XsltLibrary class.

Methods

  • AddNewIndex(XPathNavigator,Int32,XmlILIndex)

    Adds a newly built index over the specified context document to the existing collection of indexes.

    public void AddNewIndex (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator context, int indexId, System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlILIndex index);

    Parameters

    • context
      XPathNavigator

      An instance of the XPathNavigator class.

    • indexId
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    • index
      XmlILIndex

      An instance of the XmlILIndex class.

  • ChangeTypeXsltArgument(Int32,Object,Type)

    Converts a value from the CLR type of the value parameter to CLR destinationType by using V1 XSLT rules. Converts any result tree fragment values to nodes.

    public object ChangeTypeXsltArgument (int indexType, object value, Type destinationType);

    Parameters

    • indexType
      Int32

      A value of type Int32.

    • value
      System.Object

      A value of type object.

    • destinationType
      Type

      A value of type Type.

    Returns

    • System.Object

      A value of type object.

  • ChangeTypeXsltResult(Int32,Object)

    Converts from the CLR type of the value parameter to the default CLR type by which intermediate language generation represents the XML type, based on the conversion rules of the XML type.

    public object ChangeTypeXsltResult (int indexType, object value);

    Parameters

    • indexType
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    • value
      System.Object

      A value of type object.

    Returns

    • System.Object

      A value of type object.

  • ComparePosition(XPathNavigator,XPathNavigator)

    Compares the relative positions of two navigators.

    public int ComparePosition (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigatorThis, System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigatorThat);

    Parameters

    • navigatorThis
      XPathNavigator

      An instance of the XPathNavigator class.

    • navigatorThat
      XPathNavigator

      An instance of the XPathNavigator class.

    Returns

    • Int32

      -1 if navigatorThis is before navigatorThat; 1 if navigatorThis is after navigatorThat; 0 if both navigators are positioned at the same node.

  • CreateCollation(String)

    Creates a collation from a string.

    public System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlCollation CreateCollation (string collation);

    Parameters

    • collation
      String

      A value of type string.

    Returns

    • XmlCollation

      An instance of the XmlCollation class.

  • DebugGetGlobalNames()

    Returns an array containing the names of all the global variables and parameters used in this query.

    public string[] DebugGetGlobalNames ();

    Returns

    • String[]

      An array of string values.

    Remarks

    The format of the returned array is {namespace}prefix:local-name.

  • DebugGetGlobalValue(String)

    Gets the value of a global value that has the specified name.

    public System.Collections.IList DebugGetGlobalValue (string name);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      A value of type string.

    Returns

    • IList

      A sequence of XPathItem instances, or null if there is no global value that has the specified name.

  • DebugGetXsltValue(IList)

    Converts a sequence to its appropriate XSLT type.

    public object DebugGetXsltValue (System.Collections.IList seq);

    Parameters

    • seq
      IList

      An instance of the IList class.

    Returns

    • System.Object

      A value of type object.

  • DebugSetGlobalValue(String,Object)

    Sets the value of a global value that has the specified name.

    public void DebugSetGlobalValue (string name, object value);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      A value of type string.

    • value
      System.Object

      A value of type object.

  • DocOrderDistinct(IList<XPathNavigator>)

    Gets distinct sorted nodes from the specified sequence.

    public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> DocOrderDistinct (System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> seq);

    Parameters

    • seq
      IList<XPathNavigator>

      A sequence of XPathNavigator instances.

    Returns

    • IList<XPathNavigator>

      An IList of XPathNavigator objects.

  • EarlyBoundFunctionExists(String,String)

    Determines whether the specified early-bound object contains a method with the specified name.

    public bool EarlyBoundFunctionExists (string name, string namespaceUri);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The method name to look for.

    • namespaceUri
      String

      Identifies the early-bound object.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the early-bound object identified by namespaceUri contains a method that matches name; otherwise, false.

  • EndRtfConstruction(XmlQueryOutput)

    Finishes constructing an RTF.

    public System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator EndRtfConstruction (out System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput output);

    Parameters

    • output
      XmlQueryOutput

      An instance of the XmlQueryOutput class.

    Returns

    • XPathNavigator

      An instance of the XPathNavigator class.

  • EndSequenceConstruction(XmlQueryOutput)

    Finishes constructing a nested sequence of items.

    public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem> EndSequenceConstruction (out System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput output);

    Parameters

    • output
      XmlQueryOutput

      An instance of the XmlQueryOutput class.

    Returns

    • IList<XPathItem>

      A sequence of instances of the XPathItem class.

  • FindIndex(XPathNavigator,Int32,XmlILIndex)

    Returns the index with the specified ID if it has already been created over the specified document, and returns true. Otherwise, creates a new, empty index and returns false.

    public bool FindIndex (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator context, int indexId, out System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlILIndex index);

    Parameters

    • context
      XPathNavigator

      The context document.

    • indexId
      Int32

      The index ID to look for.

    • index
      XmlILIndex

      The returned index.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      An instance of the XmlILIndex class.

  • GenerateId(XPathNavigator)

    Generate a unique string identifier for the specified node.

    public string GenerateId (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator);

    Parameters

    • navigator
      XPathNavigator

      An instance of the XPathNavigator class.

    Returns

    • String

      A value of type string.

  • GetAtomizedName(Int32)

    Gets the atomized name at the specified index in the array of names.

    public string GetAtomizedName (int index);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    Returns

    • String

      A value of type string.

  • GetCollation(Int32)

    Gets a collation that was statically created.

    public System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlCollation GetCollation (int index);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    Returns

    • XmlCollation

      An instance of the XmlCollation class.

  • GetEarlyBoundObject(Int32)

    Gets the specifiied early-bound extension object. If this object does not yet exist, creates an instance using the corresponding ConstructorInfo.

    public object GetEarlyBoundObject (int index);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    Returns

    • System.Object

      A value of type object.

  • GetGlobalValue(Int32)

    Returns the value that is bound to the specified global variable. If the value has not yet been computed, computes it and stores it in the global variable.

    public object GetGlobalValue (int index);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    Returns

    • System.Object

      The value that is bound to the specified global variable.

  • GetNameFilter(Int32)

    Gets the name filter at the specified index in the array of filters.

    public System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter GetNameFilter (int index);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    Returns

    • XmlNavigatorFilter

      An instance of the XmlNavigatorFilter class.

  • GetTypeFilter(XPathNodeType)

    Gets a filter that filters nodes of the specified type.

    public System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter GetTypeFilter (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType nodeType);

    Parameters

    • nodeType
      XPathNodeType

      An instance of the XPathNodeType class.

    Returns

    • XmlNavigatorFilter

      An instance of the XmlNavigatorFilter class.

  • IsGlobalComputed(Int32)

    Returns true if the specified global value has already been computed.

    public bool IsGlobalComputed (int index);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the value has been computed; otherwise, false.

  • IsQNameEqual(XPathNavigator,XPathNavigator)

    Compares the stem.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName* and stem.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI* properties of two XPathNavigator instances to check if they are equal.

    public bool IsQNameEqual (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator n1, System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator n2);

    Parameters

    • n1
      XPathNavigator

      An instance of the XPathNavigator class.

    • n2
      XPathNavigator

      An instance of the XPathNavigator class.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the names are equal; otherwise, false.

  • IsQNameEqual(XPathNavigator,Int32,Int32)

    Determines whether the stem.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName* and stem.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI* properties of the specified XPathNavigator are equal to the names specified in the parameters.

    public bool IsQNameEqual (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator, int indexLocalName, int indexNamespaceUri);

    Parameters

    • navigator
      XPathNavigator

      An instance of the XPathNavigator class.

    • indexLocalName
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    • indexNamespaceUri
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the names are equal; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    The IsQNameEqual method calls the GetAtomizedName method to get the local name and the namespace URI based on the indexLocalName and indexNamespaceUri.

  • MatchesXmlType(IList<XPathItem>,Int32)

    Returns true if the type of every item in the specified sequence matches the XML type that the specified index identifies.

    public bool MatchesXmlType (System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem> seq, int indexType);

    Parameters

    • seq
      IList<XPathItem>

      An stem.Collections.Generic.IList`1 of XPathItemobjects.

    • indexType
      Int32

      The index.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the type of seq is a subtype of the indexType; otherwise, false.

  • MatchesXmlType(IList<XPathItem>,XmlTypeCode)

    Determines whether the type of the specified sequence is a subtype of the specified singleton type.

    public bool MatchesXmlType (System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem> seq, System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode code);

    Parameters

    • seq
      IList<XPathItem>

      A sequence of XPathItem instances.

    • code
      XmlTypeCode

      A singleton type.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the type of seq is a subtype the type specified by code; otherwise, false.

  • MatchesXmlType(XPathItem,Int32)

    Returns true if the type of the specified XPathItem object matches the specified XML type.

    public bool MatchesXmlType (System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem item, int indexType);

    Parameters

    • item
      XPathItem

      An instance of the XPathItem class.

    • indexType
      Int32

      The index in the array of XML types..

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the type of the specified XPathItem matches the specified XML type; otherwise, false.

  • MatchesXmlType(XPathItem,XmlTypeCode)

    Returns true if the type of the XPathItem object is a subtype of a type identified by the specified XmlTypeCode.

    public bool MatchesXmlType (System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem item, System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode code);

    Parameters

    • item
      XPathItem

      An instance of the XPathItem class.

    • code
      XmlTypeCode

      An instance of the XmlTypeCode class.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      Returns true if the type of the XPathItem object is a subtype of a type identified by the specified XmlTypeCode, otherwise, false.

  • OnCurrentNodeChanged(XPathNavigator)

    Used for debugging in Visual Studio. Called after the current node has changed.

    public static int OnCurrentNodeChanged (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator currentNode);

    Parameters

    • currentNode
      XPathNavigator

      XPathNavigator object that identifies the node.

    Returns

    • Int32

      An integer that indicates the status of the change. Used for internal testing only.

  • ParseTagName(String,Int32)

    Parses the specified tag name and resolves the resulting prefix. If the prefix cannot be resolved, an error is thrown.

    public System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName ParseTagName (string tagName, int indexPrefixMappings);

    Parameters

    • tagName
      String

      The tag name.

    • indexPrefixMappings
      Int32

      The index.

    Returns

    • XmlQualifiedName

      An instance of the XmlQualifiedName class.

  • ParseTagName(String,String)

    Parses the specified tag name. Returns an XmlQualifiedName that consists of the parsed local name and the specified namespace.

    public System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName ParseTagName (string tagName, string ns);

    Parameters

    • tagName
      String

      The tag name.

    • ns
      String

      The namespace.

    Returns

    • XmlQualifiedName

      An instance of the XmlQualifiedName class.

  • SendMessage(String)

    Reports query execution information to the event handler.

    public void SendMessage (string message);

    Parameters

    • message
      String

      A value of type string.

  • SetGlobalValue(Int32,Object)

    Returns the value that is bound to the specified global variable or parameter.

    public void SetGlobalValue (int index, object value);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      A value of type int.

    • value
      System.Object

      A value of type object.

  • StartRtfConstruction(String,XmlQueryOutput)

    Starts constructing an RTF and returns a new XmlQueryOutput object that will be used to construct this RTF.

    public void StartRtfConstruction (string baseUri, out System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput output);

    Parameters

    • baseUri
      String

      A value of type string.

    • output
      XmlQueryOutput

      An instance of the XmlQueryOutput class.

  • StartSequenceConstruction(XmlQueryOutput)

    Starts constructing a nested sequence of items. Returns a new XmlQueryOutput that will be used to construct this new sequence.

    public void StartSequenceConstruction (out System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput output);

    Parameters

    • output
      XmlQueryOutput

      An instance of the XmlQueryOutput class.

  • TextRtfConstruction(String,String)

    Constructs a new XPathNavigator from the specified text.

    public System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator TextRtfConstruction (string text, string baseUri);

    Parameters

    • text
      String

      A value of type string.

    • baseUri
      String

      A value of type string.

    Returns

    • XPathNavigator

      An instance of the XPathNavigator class.

  • ThrowException(String)

    Throws an XML exception that has the specified message text.

    public void ThrowException (string text);

    Parameters

    • text
      String

      A value of type string.

rawMetadata.title: XmlQueryRuntime class | Microsoft Docs
rawMetadata.description: Provides methods and properties to support the XSLT processor.
